PATIENT_ID: TEST_ERT_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-05 10:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-05 10:10:00
Category II activation for 44-year-old female. Restrained passenger in MVC.
Alert and oriented. Ambulatory at scene.
BP 118/74, HR 80, RR 16, GCS 15.
Mild chest wall tenderness. No respiratory distress.
Hemodynamically stable throughout evaluation.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-05 10:30:00
CT chest: two left-sided rib fractures. No pneumothorax.
No other injuries on survey.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-05 10:50:00
Admitted for observation of rib fractures. Adequate pain control.
Discharged next day in stable condition.
